title: CU Boulder Chapter of the Association for Women in Mathematics
description: To provide general support at the discretion of the faculty director for the AWM Boulder Chapter including but not limited to: scholarships, speakers for research talks, workshops, community building activities, and outreach.
marketingContent: To provide general support at the discretion of the faculty director for the AWM Boulder Chapter including but not limited to: scholarships, speakers for research talks, workshops, community building activities, and outreach.
